images.alt: DRUMSTICK Minis Vanilla Caramel Frozen Desert Cones, Multipack, 6 x 63 ml.
drumstick chockolate fudge brownie king cones

text: The creamy, crunchy, classic Vanilla Caramel DRUMSTICK now comes in a mini-sized treat. DRUMSTICK Minis Vanilla Caramel 6-Pack features creamy-tasting vanilla with a deliciously rich caramel centre, dipped in a chocolatey coating and sprinkled with crunchy peanut topping. Made with dairy from Canadian cows, this 6-Pack is smaller in size, but just as big in taste and is sure to excite your buds and tastebuds alike. Raise your cone to DRUMSTICK goodness!
Frozen treat with creamy-tasting vanilla, a sweet caramel centre covered in chocolatey coating and crunchy peanuts
DRUMSTICK has been THE ORIGINAL SUNDAE CONE®for over 80 years
